title: Anime Reborn Tier List
description: Discover the top units in Anime Reborn with our comprehensive tier list, categorizing characters from S Tier to C Tier based on their performance and abilities.
heading: Anime Reborn Tier List
introText: Discover the top units in Anime Reborn with our comprehensive tier list, categorizing characters from S Tier to C Tier based on their performance and abilities.

data.itemDescription: A hybrid exclusive unit with immunity to stuns and increasing damage as he eliminates enemies during waves. Features a multi-hit line AoE attack with excellent DPS and extremely low SPA
One of the strongest units, becoming Hybrid when evolved. Boasts the largest full AoE range in the game with exceptional DPS and the "Atomic" ability, acting as a powerful nuke
Excels when paired with units that freeze enemies, dealing +35% more damage to frozen targets. Becomes a hybrid at upgrade 7 and freezes enemies for 5 seconds with every fifth attack
A hill mythic unit with affordable placement and solid DPS. Grants +100% yen from kills, serving as an effective secondary farm unit
A hybrid unit with full AoE upon evolution and the ability to summon. Buffs other Light units within range by +20% DMG, making it highly meta, especially with the Miracle trait

A full AoE unit with remarkable DPS potential. Becomes Hybrid when upgraded and possesses passives that freeze enemies below 40% health and reduce SPA by -10% for 15 seconds upon killing a frozen enemy (up to -30% max)
Top-tier shield-breakers among secret units, featuring a hybrid line attack and beneficial DMG/SPA scaling passives. Possess a full AoE ability with a 300-second cooldown, ideal for managing mobs
An early-access exclusive unit with burn effect, decent DPS, and allows for four placements. Useful until more mythic units are acquired
Ignores enemy element damage debuffs, ensuring consistent performance across modes. Features a line AoE attack, exceptional DPS, and summons that scale with damage
A versatile unit with commendable DPS and range. Becomes Hybrid upon evolution and offers a balanced mix of offense and utility
A meta full AoE hybrid unit with high stats and a supportive passive when evolved. The acquisition process can be challenging, but the unit's performance compensates for it
Exhibits significant DPS potential, especially when paired with units that can consistently freeze enemies. Deals +25% more damage to frozen targets and an additional 15% as DoT over 5 seconds
A hill unit with commendable DPS. However, its line attack and less impactful passive limit its overall effectiveness
A unique unit with a blend of support and DPS capabilities. Offers specific buffs and abilities that can be strategically utilized in various scenarios
A decent DPS unit with satisfactory range. Its performance is enhanced when synergized with other units, though it doesn't stand out individually

One of the few full AoE non-secret units with impressive range. As a hybrid, it eliminates the need for a separate hill unit and gains a stun effect upon evolution, making it highly relevant in the current meta
A unit with specialized abilities, offering unique attack patterns and effects. Its utility is situational, depending on the specific challenges faced
A solid choice for Infinite mode due to scaling passives and good overall DPS. Lacks full AoE compared to top-tier units but remains a reliable option
Applies burn and possesses excellent DPS and range. Highly effective against mobs and capable of confronting bosses in the absence of specialized units
A unit with awakening abilities that enhance its performance. Offers a mix of offensive and defensive capabilities, making it versatile in various scenarios
A meta shield-breaker with attacks that instantly break shields and immunity to CC from boss attacks. Receives additional buffs when paired with Yamo, though it targets only ground enemies
A unit with evolved abilities, providing enhanced stats and skills. Its effectiveness varies based on team composition and enemy types
A ground unit with subpar damage and range. Its abilities are limited, making it less effective in most game scenarios
Offers mediocre DPS and lacks unique abilities. Its performance doesn't stand out, making it a less favorable choice
Features a unique attack style but falls short in damage and utility compared to higher-tier units
A ground unit with average stats and no distinguishing features, limiting its effectiveness in battles
Possesses a unique design but lacks the damage output and abilities to be impactful in most scenarios
Despite an interesting concept, its low DPS and lack of versatility make it less viable in challenging content
Offers minimal damage and lacks significant abilities, resulting in limited utility
An awakened unit that doesn't provide substantial improvements over its base form, leading to underwhelming performance
Features rapid attacks but lacks the damage and utility to be effective in higher-level content
